description: Naoto is one of Reika`s high school classmates who has a crush on her. When he`s first introduced, he has a hard time confessing his feelings for her and when he tried getting intimate with Reika, she refused his impulses and slaps him in the face before running back home humiliated. Once he learns from Ayano about the Lust Demon and Yuko`s strange behavior, he decides to help the girls investigate the cases and un cover the source behind the demon/Yuko`s true motives. He eventually becomes protective of Reika to the point of saving her from Yuko`s torture and helping Ayano in killing the Lust demon.
name: Tamura Naoto
